rule: The chatbot must accurately determine the most appropriate category based on the content of the input text without relying on provided examples.
input: The European Union negotiates new trade deals amid rising tensions.
validityText:
The input provided consists of a single sentence that appears to be a headline rather than a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a news article and should represent a complete news article suitable for classification. Since the input does not constitute a complete news article, it does not comply with the input specification.
